Locked school doors may become norm

Moore convicted in massacre retrial

Dwayne Moore, 35, was convicted of four counts of first-degree murder, as well as home invasion, and armed robbery, in the brutal September 2010 slayings in Mattapan. He is set to be sentenced this morning. (Globe)
